name: WotW 2005 VR game
description: I have way too much free time. -_- (also, you may want to put all of these files into a folder!) THIS GAME IS JUST GETTING STARTED, GIVE FEEDBACK AND I MAY IMPLEMENT IT! ALSO, THIS GAME IS VR ONLY!!!!!! (im working on adding a desktop port too) This is also an oculus ONLY game. 0.2 will have more headsets, and i might do a desktop port too!
